name: INSTINCTIVE DAREDEVIL
description: You thrive in fast-moving markets and enjoy the thrill of volatility. Your high risk tolerance combined with a strong intuition makes you unafraid to jump into opportunities others might shy away from. You read the market's energy and make quick decisions based on what feels right in the moment.
tip: Add just a bit more structure — it can multiply your natural instinct.

name: CALCULATED RISK-TAKER
description: You're comfortable taking significant risks, but only when backed by solid analysis and a clear strategy. You combine high risk tolerance with systematic thinking, allowing you to pursue larger positions and volatility while maintaining discipline.
cautions: Risking too much on structured bets
tip: Your structured approach is strong — remember to trust your gut sometimes too.

name: DISCIPLINED PLANNER
description: You prefer low-risk, methodical approaches with clear rules and systematic execution. Your careful risk management and strategic mindset help you build steady, sustainable gains over time. You're patient and wait for high-probability setups.
tip: You have solid discipline — occasionally trust the flow and take calculated leaps.

name: CAUTIOUS OBSERVER
description: You prefer lower-risk approaches and trust your instincts over complex strategies. You're careful and thoughtful, preferring to watch the market develop before making your move. When you do trade, it's often based on a strong intuitive sense rather than detailed analysis.
tip: Your cautious nature protects you — add more structured planning to boost confidence.
